lead_paragraph: The six-time Pro Bowl fullback Mike Alstott announced his retirement after 12 seasons Thursday at a tearful news conference during which the Buccaneers played a film of his most memorable plays. Alstott, Tampa Bay’s career touchdown leader, spent the past season on injured reserve with a neck problem.
